ehi_preview:
Preview (A map restart is required to take effect)
Red corner indicates where the first tracker is going to appear
ehi_scale_desc: Sets scale of trackers. The higher number the bigger trackers are and vice versa
ehi_vr_scale_desc: Sets scale of trackers in VR. The higher number the bigger trackers are and vice versa
ehi_time_format_desc: Defines how tracker should be formated
ehi_show_achievement_desc:
Shows on the screen timed achievements
Some heists may not have any timed achievements available
ehi_show_gained_xp_desc:
Shows earned XP in a mission.
This tracker is disabled in Crime Spree.
ehi_xp_format_desc:
Example: Base value: 1000; Death Wish difficulty
Base value only: 1000
Value multiplied with difficulty: 13000
Value multiplied with all XP bonuses: 13000+
ehi_xp_format_all_bonuses: Show value multiplied with all XP bonuses
ehi_xp_panel_1: Show panel for every XP gained
ehi_xp_panel_2: Show total XP gained from the heist
ehi_show_trade_delay_desc: Shows trade delay when you or your teammates kill a civilian
ehi_show_trade_delay_option_desc:
Always: Always show a tracker when you or your teammate killed a civilian
In Custody: Show a tracker when you or your teammate went to custody and killed atleast 1 civilian
ehi_show_trade_delay_other_players_only: Show Trade Delay Tracker For Other Players Only
ehi_show_trade_delay_other_players_only_: When enabled, this tracker will not show how many civilians you killed but it will still show for other players.
ehi_show_timers_desc: Shows timers for hacking, drilling, sawing, etc...
ehi_show_zipline_timer_desc:
Shows 2 timers for zipline.
First timer shows how long it takes to drop a bag/player, second timer shows zipline reset
ehi_show_gage_tracker_desc:
Shows tracker for Gage Packages on the map.
If the map does not allow Gage Packages, the tracker will not show
ehi_show_captain_damage_reduction_desc: Shows tracker for damage reduction when Captain is present
ehi_show_equipment_tracker_desc: Shows a separate tracker for deployed Doctor Bags, Ammo Bags, Grenade Cases, Body Bags and First Aid Kits
ehi_show_equipment_doctorbag_desc: Shows a tracker for Doctor Bags
ehi_show_equipment_ammobag_desc: Shows a tracker for Ammo Bags
ehi_show_equipment_grenadecases_desc: Shows a tracker for Grenade Crates
ehi_show_equipment_bodybags_desc:
Shows a tracker for Body Bags
This tracker is removed when alarm sounds
ehi_show_equipment_firstaidkit_desc: Shows a tracker for First Aid Kits
ehi_show_equipment_aggregate_health: Aggregate Doctor Bags and First Aid Kits
ehi_show_equipment_aggregate_health_desc: Aggregates Doctor Bags and First Aid Kits into one tracker
ehi_show_minion_tracker_desc: Shows tracker for how much converted enemies are on the map
ehi_show_difficulty_tracker_desc: Shows a tracker for how much difficulty the wave is
ehi_show_pager_tracker_desc: Shows a tracker for how many pagers you have left
